website_summaries.verdict: Nice-looking, relatively inexpensive titanium watch designed with practicality for people with an active lifestyle.
pros: Sand-blasted matte finish case, durable and lightweight
Patented 2-ply nylon Bertucci band is long-lasting and comfortable
Luminous hour digits and accents on hands
Screw-down crown offset at 4 o'clock for ergonomic functionality
cons: Date display is small for readability

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my Bertucci Men's 12022 A-2T on January 7, 2015. I like the idea of the titanium case. It kept perfect time, and the band is easily removable to be cleaned, as the watch pins are cast into the watch case; a great feature. A damp paper towel with Windex and the watch is clean. In March, the second hand fell off. I contacted them via e-mail, and they agreed to repair my watch for free.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent cheap watch.
customer_reviews.text: .I just received the watch so my review may change over time. The first thing I noticed is I csn. Not read the date. At first I figured I needed to put on my reading glasses but that did help. When the date is in the teens you can barely see the 1 digit. I compared this to my expensive Marathon watch and had no problem reading the date no matter what the day. I bought this for work because I need a light watch that can hand a little bit of abuse. Time will tell and I will update this review as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tariq Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch for the price!
customer_reviews.text: A great field watch at a great price. I love the style of this watch. Other key features that sold me on this watch were as follows. 1) The watch is titanium. Most field watches and are run of the mill stainless steel. This feels light and tough. 2) The model I got was water resistant to 200 meters. 3) The model i got has a date feature. An attractive titanium field watch with a date feature and 200 meter water resistance for sub $150 is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found no flaws and it was perfect out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Rough and tumble beater that I think will last a long time. I found no flaws and it was perfect out of the box. Even the second hand lines up exactly on the markers (that doesn't always happen with a quartz watch). The strap is very thick and takes a little time to break in, but I have no doubt that it will be quite durable. I would certainly buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lukaszewicz

customer_reviews.title: overall held up well with minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this watch since 2015. At that time it was around $90 on Amazon. Overall, it has served me very well, still on 1st battery, and it still keeps time very accurately. What I don't like so much after 5 years: 1. It wears "small". Not so small that you can't read the dial but small compared with other contemporary watches => if I would buy another one I would get a larger model 2. Despite being "hardened mineral glass" I managed to get a scratch on the crystal since I frequently wear it to work => if I would buy another one I would pay the extra for a sapphire crystal model
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: The watch that refuses to die...
customer_reviews.text: Received one of these as a gift approx 6 years ago and absolutely love it still. Since then I've purchased one for each of my two 20-something sons. If you are an active outdoors person, you will appreciate this sturdy, dependable, well-designed watch. Worn daily in all types of extreme weather and humidity conditions. Definitely 5-star construction and quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: wheelgunner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome "crystal" strength and clarity.
customer_reviews.text: I work on a golf course maintenance crew, mainly irrigation and drainage issues. This watch has proven to be very well made. Daily my hands are in water and mud. Watch has stood up to all conditions. My favorite aspect of this watch is the crystal over the watch, it has stayed very clear through some very possible damaging (scratching) situations. Very much recommend this watch to anyone that works, hikes, or plays a lot outside.
customer_reviews.author: JohnC

customer_reviews.title: Titanium-Durable field watch
customer_reviews.text: I needed a solid and durable watch for work. This thing is light weight and durable titanium. The band is a bit stiff but get worn in over time making for a nice watch band that’s easy to replace. The crown at 4 is a nice touch as well, you don’t have it digging into the hand when bent. Havnt work a watch in years and so far this thing feels good on the wrist and ready for a hard days worth of work
customer_reviews.author: kyle moak

customer_reviews.title: Overall, it is a good daily watch.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the watch, particularly its crown being offset from x-axis. The date window is small, and difficult to read. It runs about a minute fast every two days, must reset weekly. The band is clunky and can only be replaced with their own proprietary bands, which are also clunky and expensive. The iridescent dial glows after being exposed to a light bulb for a couple of minutes, and lasts hours after that.
customer_reviews.author: JuanP

customer_reviews.title: A good workhorse watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, wears well, keeps time closely. Even the most advanced feature (resetting the day and date) is within my competence. I haven't fallen out of a boat so I can't speak to its water-resistance. I've had it three years, worn it daily, and it looks as good as new, even the strap.
customer_reviews.author: snapper

customer_reviews.title: Tough minimalist watch
customer_reviews.text: What I love: - minimal lovely design - tough as nails: this watch will last A LONG TIME - super robust strap What I don't love: - lum is not the best but decent - date complication is not very legible... - strap metal buckles sometimes brush against my mac, would be great if the metal buckles were not on the bottom but on the top side Overall: 7.5/10
customer_reviews.author: hauget

customer_reviews.title: I think this watch is a perfect solution to his past issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone who generally doesn't wear watches because he is active and rough, which typically caused his two piece straps to break or the pins to constantly come out. I think this watch is a perfect solution to his past issues. It was a very nice watch and I was somewhat envious to give it away because I don't even own a Bertucci myself, but someday I definitely will. Seller (The Watch Co.) was very quick and communicative. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice watch looks great comfortable looks and feels solid
customer_reviews.text: Watch was what I expected, nice watch looks great comfortable looks and feels solid. Will be wearing to work and think it will be perfect. Problem: The date window is small, read this in several reviews not a huge deal however I am unable to change date as per instructions. Watch came broken. Disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent practical timepiece
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a similar watch after 12 years because I was careless and dropped it 5 feet onto a tile floor. I liked it so much that I bought a second one just like it. The watch is a great value and is quite accurate, readable in the dark and is a good design. David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, is not too large and is easy to read

It also looks good, is light and not too large and is easy to read in any light or the dark. I don't have a large wrist, the band is exactly what I need so anyone with needs for a larger band will need to order a longer one.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Impressive

The only thing I didn't like, is that the date dial has to be reset on months not ending in 31 days. It would have been nice to see a dual (digital and analog) display, a backlight indiglow, and maybe a rotating compass, as well, but otherwise I'm very pleased with this purchase.

product_meta.title: Bertucci Men's 12022 A-2T Original Classics Durable Titanium Field Watch
product_meta.description:
Our Story, Your Watch

Our story is a simple one. It’s all about building a better watch, and it’s all about our promise of performance to you. This is derived from a belief that long lasting quality, and attention to detail matter. It is this focus and integrity that drive us - an honest, true and authentic way. We believe if a watch is done right, it connects with you, creating an emotional touch point that says something about you. This is how we approach watches at Bertucci. This could only come from a company solely focused on field watches for you.

What is a Bertucci Field Watch

If you were to own only one watch, it would be a watch well suited for life’s endeavors. It would need to possess the qualities of durability, singularity of purpose, and versatility in use. In essence, equally rugged and refined, with a classic, understated, and enduring style.

For years, Bertucci Field Watches have been field tested and validated in places far and wide. They generally end up in places where time is best spent, or places that bridge the human experience, or places where life may travel at the same speed, but where it holds more value. Bertucci Field Watches are ready to survive the day to day challenges that come your way … wherever that place may be.

Durability By Design

You’ll feel it the moment you wrap a Bertucci Field Watch around your wrist. You’ll notice the innovative, ergonomic design, quality materials, and the premium features and components that went into it. When we create a watch, we study the ways in which it will be worn and used by people that demand the most from the products they depend on. This approach requires an attention to detail - an attention to performance. That’s no accident, it’s the result of our Durability By Design certification process and the foundation for our Promise Of Performance. Simply put, Bertucci Field Watches perform like no other watch because they’re built like no other watch.

Original... Our Passion

It’s in our blood and it’s in our brand. Bertucci Field Watches is a 10 years old, independent start up, stand alone U.S. Company. We are the market leader in titanium field watches, offering the widest array of solid titanium styles in a variety of case shapes, designs, sizes and finishes. Our watches are designed, engineered, tooled and manufactured from the ground up with a passion for performance - it’s about doing things the right way. Our unique approach results in watches that are truly original.



Versatile design with wide appeal. The Bertucci solid titanium A-2T Original Classics™ strike the right balance between tradition and innovation. The U.S. patented classic 40 mm round design is cast and then machined from solid titanium, a material we believe to be the best for a watch case. 1.9 oz. of pure performance - the A-2T Original Classics™ feature a highly functional, and yet simply classic dial. Understated styling compliments a watch that is ready for the rigors of the day.
